recommendations: Faith M. ‚ÄúBimlesh is a great mentor, leader and executive coach. Bimlesh's guidance on key decisions really helped me get clarity and structure and he has a very focused and outcomes-based approach which is excellent. I felt really comfortable with our mentoring relationship and felt I gained great insight. He has vast knowledge and will be able to assist anyone seeking direction in any startup environment. Don't hesitate to contact him and work with him, the rewards are great and he adds tremendous value. ‚Äù

Yogesh M. ‚ÄúBimlesh worked to train my different software product development teams on the Agile methodology, focusing on SCRUM. Bimlesh used a blend of thought process and a lot of practical and experimental approach to let the participants absorb the principles of Agile and adapt the practices of SCRUM. The result of the trainings has been a better adoption of agile/scrum within my teams and a lot more confidence at providing quality deliverable from all my teams.‚Äù
